bullets: Own production systems end-to-end, including on-call rotations and P0 incident response for accounting integrations serving enterprise customers.
Debug and resolve complex cross-system failures across NetSuite, QBO, Xero, Sage Intacct, Business Central, and Sage 300 under high-pressure situations.
Lead production deployments with zero-downtime rollouts; established rollback procedures and deployment checklists adopted by the team.
Refactored high-volume API endpoints handling thousands of daily sync operations; reduced latency and improved throughput for batch exports.
Implemented Django Q2 task queuing for efficient background job processing across integration workflows.
Profiled and optimized PostgreSQL queries for large-scale data synchronization between internal platforms and ERP systems.
Built Grafana dashboards and Sentry alerts for integration health monitoring; reduced mean time to detection for production issues.
Established logging standards and error tracking patterns that improved debugging efficiency across the integrations team.
Built chatbot for customer communication workflows.
Developed internal CRM for data visualization.
Developed REST APIs for web application features.
Built XML generation service for Google Search integration.
